metadata.name: Ordem Pura #01
metadata.description: "In the future, a prophet named Ava arose with a unique vision. She believed in the harmonious balance between technology and nature. She preached that technology could help preserve the natural world and enhance human life, but only if used wisely and responsibly. Ava gained many followers who were inspired by her message and the way she combined the best of both worlds. Her followers worked hard to create sustainable technologies that did not harm the environment, and encouraged others to do the same. However, many others were skeptical of Ava's teachings and thought she was trying to change the world too quickly. They felt that relying too much on technology was dangerous, and that humans should stick to their traditional ways of life. Despite the opposition, Ava persisted in her mission and continued to spread her message. She showed that with technology, humans could live in harmony with nature and not harm it in any way."
